com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging

Class DefaultResponseLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.common.logging.DefaultResponseLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageLog, MessageLogBuilder, ResponseLog, ResponseLogBuilder, AttributeMap, java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<ResponseLog>, java.util.concurrent.Future<ResponseLog>

    public final class DefaultResponseLog
extends java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>
implements ResponseLog, ResponseLogBuilder
    Default ResponseLog implementation.

        public void end()
        Description copied from interface: MessageLogBuilder
